      • isItemValidInput

        public static boolean isItemValidInput(net.minecraft.item.crafting.RecipeManager rm,
                                       net.minecraft.item.crafting.IRecipeType<?> recipeType,
                                       net.minecraft.item.ItemStack stack)
        Gets whether an ItemStack is a valid input for at least one recipe of a given recipe type.
        Parameters:
        rm - The recipe manager to use. You can get one from a world.

      • matches

        public static boolean matches(net.minecraft.item.crafting.IRecipe<?> recipe,
                              java.util.List<net.minecraft.item.ItemStack> stacks,
                              boolean exactMatch)
        Checks whether all the ingredients of a recipe are present in a list of ItemStacks. This does not check that all ingredients are on different slots.
        Parameters:
        exactMatch - When this is true this will return false if the stack list contains more items than the recipe requires.

      • stackUp

        public java.util.List<net.minecraft.item.ItemStack> stackUp(java.util.List<net.minecraft.item.ItemStack> stacks,
                                                            boolean ignoreMaxStackSize)
        Takes a list of ItemStacks and stacks them up so multiple ItemStacks that can be stacked are transformed into one.
        Parameters:
        ignoreMaxStackSize - Whether this should create ItemStacks with a stack size greater than the maximum.
